      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SKServer SKServer.addConnection(java.net.Socket socket)
      Adds a client connection to this server and performs the initialization procedure.
      SKServer SKServer.addPacketListener(SKPacketListener packetListener)
      Adds a packet listener to this server.
      SKServer SKServer.bind(java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
      Binds the server socket to the specified InetSocketAddress.
      SKServer SKServer.bind(java.lang.String hostname, int port)
      Binds the server socket to the specified host name and port.
      protected SKServer SKServer.close(int clientID, boolean local, java.lang.String msg)
      Closes the socket of the specified client.
      protected SKServer SKConnection.getServer()
      Returns the server associated with with this connection.
      SKServer SKServer.setMaxConnections(int maxConnections)
      Sets the number of maximum client connections allowed.
      SKServer SKServer.setTimeout(int ms)
      Sets the SO-timeout for this server's ServerSocket.
      SKServer SKServer.start()
      Starts all the underlying server threads.
